thread.section_title: Rubber Stamp Champ Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rubber Stamp Champ | rubberstampchamp.com
thread.title: Kathy
thread.title_full: Rubber Stamp Champ reviewed by Kathy

author: Kathy
title: Kathy
text: I think this is my second or third "personal" stamp order from RSC. This time it was another personal order, but I've also ordered stamps for work and then got my office to order more for the rest of the staff. However, when I want a specialized stamp I never hesitate to come here. I usually have special stamps made for Where's George stamping and this latest one was one of those - but with a twist. I love how easy it is to design your own stamp on their website so you know what it will look like when you get it - and when it arrives, it's EXACTLY like the ones I designed. I ordered two special stamps this time and I'm sure I'll be back for more. Shop with Rubber Stamp Champ with confidence. I've never had a problem and it's easy and fun to use their website and they have a very quick turn around.
